fixed_skill.desc: Increase party's Defense by 16.3%/17.1%/17.9%. For every 500 of the user's Defense, increase party's Defense by 2.7%/2.8%/3.0% more, up to 10.8%/11.3%/11.9%. Lasts for 3 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Marakukaja

innate_skill.desc: Remove 1 stat buff from all foes.
innate_skill.name: Dekaja

passive_skill.desc: Increase HP by 14.5%. When all allies' HP is below 50%, decrease damage taken by 19%.
passive_skill.name: Hundred-Arms Defense

passive_skill.desc: Increase HP by 14.5%. When all allies' HP is below 50%, decrease damage taken by 21%.
passive_skill.name: Hundred-Arms Defense I

passive_skill.desc: Increase HP by 14.5%. When all allies' HP is below 50%, decrease damage taken by 23%.
passive_skill.name: Hundred-Arms Defense II

showtime_skill.desc: Grant a shield to party equal to 48.6%/52.0%/55.4% Attack + 1471/1854/2275 for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
